item.title: 30: Buy High, Sell Low
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Marco Arment joins John Gruber to talk about Apple’s quarterly earnings and resulting stock price dive, Marco’s new car podcast, and the original cocktail, the Old-Fashioned.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705064840/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/30/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Marco Arment joins John Gruber to talk about Apple’s quarterly earnings and resulting stock price dive, Marco’s new car podcast, and the original cocktail, the Old-Fashioned.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Marco Arment joins John Gruber to talk about Apple’s quarterly earnings and resulting stock price dive, Marco’s new car podcast, and the original cocktail, the Old-Fashioned.

item.title: 29: The Mac Faithful
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss Apple’s battered stock price, just what it is about Apple that makes so many people lose their damn minds, the pace of innovation, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705034935/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/29/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss Apple’s battered stock price, just what it is about Apple that makes so many people lose their damn minds, the pace of innovation, and more.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss Apple’s battered stock price, just what it is about Apple that makes so many people lose their damn minds, the pace of innovation, and more.

item.title: 28: Inappropriate Outfits
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber to discuss CES 2013, the disparity in display size between the iPhone and all of its competitors, and Dan’s new endeavor, City Notes.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705054111/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/28/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber to discuss CES 2013, the disparity in display size between the iPhone and all of its competitors, and Dan’s new endeavor, City Notes.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber to discuss CES 2013, the disparity in display size between the iPhone and all of its competitors, and Dan’s new endeavor, City Notes.

item.title: 27: The Glass Something or Another
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description: Special guest Dave Pell joins John Gruber for a discussion of news media, branding, independent publishing, and the new Google Maps app for iPhone.
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Dave Pell joins John Gruber for a discussion of news media, branding, independent publishing, and the new Google Maps app for iPhone.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Dave Pell joins John Gruber for a discussion of news media, branding, independent publishing, and the new Google Maps app for iPhone.

item.title: 26: Steve Wouldn’t Eat An Energy Bar
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss The Magazine and the demise of The Daily, Tim Cook’s media blitz and Apple’s recent management shake up, Twitterrific 5, and Apple’s next design aesthetic.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140328093438/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/26/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss The Magazine and the demise of The Daily, Tim Cook’s media blitz and Apple’s recent management shake up, Twitterrific 5, and Apple’s next design aesthetic.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss The Magazine and the demise of The Daily, Tim Cook’s media blitz and Apple’s recent management shake up, Twitterrific 5, and Apple’s next design aesthetic.

item.title: 25: A Therapeutic Dose of Imodium
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Very special guest Merlin Mann joins John Gruber to talk about booze, iTunes 11, and the sorry state of over-the-counter cold medication in the U.S.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140421002811/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/25/
item.itunes:subtitle: Very special guest Merlin Mann joins John Gruber to talk about booze, iTunes 11, and the sorry state of over-the-counter cold medication in the U.S.
item.itunes:summary: Very special guest Merlin Mann joins John Gruber to talk about booze, iTunes 11, and the sorry state of over-the-counter cold medication in the U.S.

item.title: 24: It's Like Drug Money
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Glenn Fleishman joins John Gruber to talk about Jeopardy, independent media (including Glenn’s new role as Executive Editor of The Magazine), Microsoft’s and Apple’s executive shake-ups, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705065546/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/24/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Glenn Fleishman joins John Gruber to talk about Jeopardy, independent media (including Glenn’s new role as Executive Editor of The Magazine), Microsoft’s and Apple’s executive shake-ups, and more.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Glenn Fleishman joins John Gruber to talk about Jeopardy, independent media (including Glenn’s new role as Executive Editor of The Magazine), Microsoft’s and Apple’s executive shake-ups, and more.

item.title: 23: More Useful and Less Horrible
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber to talk about the iPad Mini, ideas for the future of iOS, Microsoft Surface, Virgin America and the state of U.S. airlines, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140215020650/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/23/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber to talk about the iPad Mini, ideas for the future of iOS, Microsoft Surface, Virgin America and the state of U.S. airlines, and more.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber to talk about the iPad Mini, ideas for the future of iOS, Microsoft Surface, Virgin America and the state of U.S. airlines, and more.

item.title: 22: Chewbacca Does It Again
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest MG Siegler returns to talk with John Gruber about the new iPad Mini and iPad 4, Scott Forstall ouster from Apple, Microsoft Surface and the launch of Windows 8, and Disney’s acquisition of Lucasfilm and the Star Wars franchise.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705073101/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/22/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest MG Siegler returns to talk with John Gruber about the new iPad Mini and iPad 4, Scott Forstall ouster from Apple, Microsoft Surface and the launch of Windows 8, and Disney’s acquisition of Lucasfilm and the Star Wars franchise.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest MG Siegler returns to talk with John Gruber about the new iPad Mini and iPad 4, Scott Forstall ouster from Apple, Microsoft Surface and the launch of Windows 8, and Disney’s acquisition of Lucasfilm and the Star Wars franchise.

item.title: 21: Looper with Rian Johnson
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Very special guest Rian Johnson, writer-director of the hit movie Looper, joins Adam Lisagor and John Gruber for an in-depth discussion of the film and the art of filmmaking.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140409003033/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/21/
item.itunes:subtitle: Very special guest Rian Johnson, writer-director of the hit movie Looper, joins Adam Lisagor and John Gruber for an in-depth discussion of the film and the art of filmmaking.
item.itunes:summary: Very special guest Rian Johnson, writer-director of the hit movie Looper, joins Adam Lisagor and John Gruber for an in-depth discussion of the film and the art of filmmaking.

item.title: 20: Live From Çingleton
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Recorded in front of a live audience following the Çingleton conference in historic Old Montréal, Québec, John Gruber is joined by special guest Brent Simmons. Topics include dealing with the fast-changing world of being a Mac/iOS developer, the advantages of native apps over web apps (including how that pertains to Glassboard, Brent’s current project), and a whole bunch of stuff about App.net.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705052629/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/20/

item.title: 19: Ant-Covered Candy Bar
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest star John Moltz joins John Gruber. Topics include Windows 8 and Microsoft’s imminent but still largely mysterious Surface tablets, Apple’s new iPods (and their ads), Apple’s obsession with making devices ever thinner and lighter, and, of course, Yankees star Alex Rodriguez Ichiro.

item.title: 18: Instawhatsit
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Very special guest Marco Arment joins John Gruber to talk about the iPhone 5, accessibility features in Instapaper, Instagram filters, the future of photography, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705061523/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/18/
item.itunes:subtitle: John Gruber to talk about the iPhone 5, accessibility features in Instapaper, Instagram filters, the future of photography, and more.

item.title: 17: The iPhone 5 Episode
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest MG Siegler joins John Gruber this week to discuss — what else? — the iPhone 5 and iOS 6.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705065538/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/17/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest MG Siegler joins John Gruber this week to discuss — what else? — the iPhone 5 and iOS 6.

item.title: 16: Big in Indonesia
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Om Malik joins John Gruber in the Mule Radio studio to talk about last week’s announcements from Nokia and Amazon, and, of course, all of the news from this week’s iPhone 5 event in San Francisco.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705080609/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/16/

item.title: 15: The Moltzphone EXTREMO III DX
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss the new phones from Motorola and Nokia, next week’s Apple event where the iPhone 5 is presumed to be introduced, the Chinese phone maker that has already shipped an iPhone 5 knockoff, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705025427/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/15/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss the new phones from Motorola and Nokia, next week’s Apple event where the iPhone 5 is presumed to be introduced, the Chinese phone maker that has already shipped an iPhone 5 knockoff, and more.

item.title: 14: You’re Not Gonna Name Him Fuzzbutt
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest star Craig Hockenberry joins John Gruber to discuss the escalating tensions between Twitter and its third-party developers, along with Twitter’s relationship with other networks, like Tumblr and Instagram. Other topics include App.net and developing a retina-display version of xScope for the Mac.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140606204004/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/14/

item.title: 13: Unusually Open
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Michael Lopp joins John Gruber this week. Topics include the retina display revolution and its effect on typography for the screen, whether Apple would or even could ever again do a “One More Thing”, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140130090612/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/13/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Michael Lopp joins John Gruber this week. Topics include the retina display revolution and its effect on typography for the screen, whether Apple would or even could ever again do a “One More Thing”, and more.

item.title: 12: Down to the Mac Nerd Guys
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest star John Siracusa joins John Gruber for a quick two-hour twenty-minute chat about Mat Honan’s Apple ID account hacking, App.net and Twitter, Mountain Lion and Siracusa’s review thereof, and the origins and future of iOS.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140131154134/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/12/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest star John Siracusa joins John Gruber for a quick two-hour twenty-minute chat about Mat Honan’s Apple ID account hacking, App.net and Twitter, Mountain Lion and Siracusa’s review thereof, and the origins and future of iOS.

item.title: 11: We’re Going to Get You Some Jeans Today, Jimmy
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss the new “genius” Apple commercials, the Apple v. Samsung court trial, Andrew Ross Sorkin’s suggestions for major acquisitions by Apple, and more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140130091245/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/11/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest John Moltz joins John Gruber to discuss the new “genius” Apple commercials, the Apple v. Samsung court trial, Andrew Ross Sorkin’s suggestions for major acquisitions by Apple, and more.

item.title: 10: The Next Big Thing
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest MG Siegler joins John Gruber to discuss Marissa Mayer being hired as Yahoo CEO, the Nexus 7 and the tablet market, and today’s release of OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705061225/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/10/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest MG Siegler joins John Gruber to discuss Marissa Mayer being hired as Yahoo CEO, the Nexus 7 and the tablet market, and today’s release of OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion.

item.title: 9: Command Versus Splat
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber for a discussion on topics including the future of Twitter (and third-party Twitter client apps), the purportedly imminent iPad Mini and the tablet market in general, and the state of technology media.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705081003/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/9/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Dan Frommer joins John Gruber for a discussion on topics including the future of Twitter (and third-party Twitter client apps), the purportedly imminent iPad Mini and the tablet market in general, and the state of technology media.

item.title: 8: Like Giving Natalie Portman a Trucker Cap
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Merlin Mann joins John Gruber for a quick two-hour holiday-week chat.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705065103/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/8/
item.itunes:subtitle: Merlin Mann joins John Gruber for a quick two-hour holiday-week chat.

item.title: 7: Hot Ladies in Movies
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
John August and Adam Lisagor join John Gruber to discuss Apple’s new iOS Podcasts app, Google’s announcements from the I/O developers conference, creating new software to scratch your own itches, and much more.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140209213337/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/7/
item.itunes:subtitle: John August and Adam Lisagor join John Gruber to discuss Apple’s new iOS Podcasts app, Google’s announcements from the I/O developers conference, creating new software to scratch your own itches, and much more.

item.title: 6: Laggy by Any Standard
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
This week on America’s favorite two-star podcast, John Gruber is joined by special guest star Guy English. Topics include various details from last week’s WWDC (pull-to-refresh in iOS 6, Passbook, and anti-aliasing nerdery), Microsoft Surface, and a few hints about Guy’s new company and their upcoming Mac app, Napkin.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140705073238/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/6/

item.title: 5: Live from WWDC 2012
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Recorded in front of a live audience during WWDC 2012 in San Francisco, John Gruber is joined by special guest Cabel Sasser, co-founder of Panic. They discuss all the news from Apple’s WWDC keynote — the retina display MacBook Pro, OS X Mountain Lion, and iOS 6 — and the changing nature of indie app development in the App Store world.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140409142933/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/5/

item.title: 4: A Decent Thing That Someone Would Like
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
This week on America’s favorite two-star podcast, John Gruber is joined by special guest star MG Siegler. Topics include the way that Android, as an ecosystem, is spiraling out of Google control; Facebook’s purportedly “disastrous” IPO; and a rundown of the various rumors heading into next week’s WWDC.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140409142933/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/4/

item.title: 3: Superman Didn't Even Make His Own Logo
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Gruber is joined by special guest star John Moltz, the acclaimed author of A Very Nice Web Site, and they discuss Tim Cook’s appearance with Walt Mossberg and Kara Swisher at the All Things D Conference in San Something California, Windows 8, the EFF’s description of iOS as a “crystal prison”, and one of the stupidest articles anyone has ever written about Steve Jobs. And, of course, a lengthy discussion on superhero logo design.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140409142933/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/3/

item.itunes:summary: Gruber is joined by special guest star John Moltz, the acclaimed author of A Very Nice Web Site, and they discuss Tim Cook’s appearance with Walt Mossberg and Kara Swisher at the All Things D Conference in San Something California, Windows 8, the EFF’

item.title: 2: Dare I Say, Kubrick?
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
Special guest Adam Lisagor joins John Gruber to discuss the whole thing with the show leaving 5by5, spitball ideas Apple might add to iOS 6 and iCloud, and gush over the trailer for Paul Thomas Anderson’s upcoming film, The Master.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140409142933/http://www.muleradio.net/thetalkshow/2/
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Adam Lisagor joins John Gruber to discuss the whole thing with the show leaving 5by5, spitball ideas Apple might add to iOS 6 and iCloud, and gush over the trailer for Paul Thomas Anderson’s upcoming film, The Master.
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Adam Lisagor joins John Gruber to discuss the whole thing with the show leaving 5by5, spitball ideas Apple might add to iOS 6 and iCloud, and gush over the trailer for Paul Thomas Anderson’s upcoming film, The Master.

item.title: 1: What If the Dolphins Had Thumbs
item.itunes:author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.dc:creator: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
item.description:
In this, the premiere episode of The Talk Show on Mule Radio Syndicate, John Gruber is joined by special guest John Moltz, who was recently released from prison and is writing at his brand-new Very Nice Web Site. They discuss Mozilla’s antitrust concerns regarding Windows for ARM’s iOS-like restrictions on third-party apps, new reports that the next iPhone will sport a 4-inch display, Android device fragmentation, and dreamboat actor Ashton Kutcher.
https://web.archive.org/web/20140427070808/http://muleradio.net/thetalkshow/1/
item.itunes:subtitle: In this, the premiere episode of The Talk Show on Mule Radio Syndicate, John Gruber is joined by special guest John Moltz, who was recently released from prison and is writing at his brand-new Very Nice Web Site. They discuss Mozilla’s antitrust concern
